pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, December 8, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of Yukon, Sandy Silver.

9:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will virtually visit a grade 6 and 7 social studies class at Nelson Rural School in Miramichi, New Brunswick, with Member of Parliament for Miramichi–Grand Lake Pat Finnigan.

Closed to media.

2:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:15 p.m.  The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the virtual Annual General Assembly of the Assembly of First Nations and participate in a question and answer segment.

Media can register to watch the virtual Annual General Assembly by emailing ATurner@afn.ca.
